comment.author: 25695066@N00
comment._content: Flight Sergeant Axel Henning Anderson (RAAF) would later die on April 23, 1943, succumbing to injuries sustained in a non-combat crash of a Martin Balitimore (RAF Ser. No. AG 829) at Monastir landing ground in Tunisia on April 22, 1943. At the time of his death, Flt. Sgt. Anderson was attached to the 1437 Strategic Reconnaissance Flight of the Royal Air Force (RAF). Flt. Sgt. Anderson's body is buried in the New Cemetery at Sfax, Tunisia. (See: www.awm.gov.au/catalogue/research_centre/pdf/rc09125z023_...)

comment.author: 32605636@N06
comment._content: Thanks for the information. It has been added to the image record.
